rooms.name: Lobby & Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with integrated living area featuring contemporary design elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Modern kitchen layout with adjoining dining space, optimized for efficient workflow and ample storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with a large balcony designed per Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with ample space and a balcony for relaxation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully functional bathroom with contemporary fixtures and adequate storage.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Dedicated two-car garage space with additional utility area for tools and equipment.

rooms.name: Garden Courtyard
rooms.description: Large garden area with landscaped greenery and a water feature to enhance aesthetics and Vastu balance.

notes: Design incorporates contemporary aesthetics with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
The ground floor plan prioritizes ease of movement and natural light while maintaining privacy in the residential areas.
Each bedroom features a spacious balcony to provide personal space for relaxation and a connection with nature.
